entities.trees

Class TDP_Subtree_Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.trees.TDP_Subtree_Collection

  • public class TDP_Subtree_Collection
extends Object
    A collection of subtree solutions encoded as one solution plus a pointer to a shorter prefix. The class is used by TDP_Recursive to represent solutions of the same level of the tree that hang from the same node. When many instances of this class are created, they have a shared prefix structure and their instantiation is done in O(1) with the third constructor even if their size can be O(|stages|).
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

      TDP_Subtree_Collection prefix
      A prefix containing a subtree collection with @{link #size} - 1 solutions.
      int size
      The number of solutions in the collection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TDP_Subtree_Collection

        public TDP_Subtree_Collection()
        Constructor for an empty collection of solutions. Useful for the leaves of the tree. A subtree solution with one decision leading to a leaf node is represented as one decision plus an empty collection of subtrees from there (in @{link entities.trees.TDP_Subtree_Solution}).

      • TDP_Subtree_Collection

        public TDP_Subtree_Collection(TDP_Subtree_Solution sol)
        Constructor for a collection with only one solution. Useful for initializing the Lawler procedure in each junction of the tree. In that case, the argument is the optimal subtree from the first child and the collection will later be expanded optimally (by appending the rest of the optimal subtrees) when the solution containing this collection is popped from the Lawler PQ.

      • TDP_Subtree_Collection

        public TDP_Subtree_Collection(TDP_Subtree_Collection pref,
                              TDP_Subtree_Solution sol)
        Constructor that creates a new collection from a prefix concatenated with one more solution. Works in O(1). Useful for instantiating all the Lawler prefixes except the first one.

    • Method Detail

      • get_solutions

        public List<TDP_Subtree_Solution> get_solutions()
        Returns a list of all the solutions in this collection by traversing the pointers to prefixes.
        Returns:
        List The solutions as a list.

      • create_successor

        public TDP_Subtree_Collection create_successor(TDP_Subtree_Solution alt_solution)
        A successor solution has the same size but replaces the last solution with an alternative. The alternative solution is given as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        alt_solution - The alternative solution.
        Returns:
        TDP_Subtree_Collection A new object representing the collection with the alternative solution.
